pages.text: A powerful ritual of death that destroys all living things in its domain. The Ritual of Culling silently kills entities within its range, adding their life force to your Blood Altar.

pages.title: Costs & Details
pages.text: $(bold)Activation:$() 50000 LP$(br)$(bold)Refresh:$() 75 LP per entity$(br)$(bold)Refresh Time:$() 25 ticks$(br2)$(bold)Effect Range:$() 21x21x10 blocks; configurable$(br)$(#)Horizontal:$() 10 blocks radius$(br)$(#)Vertical:$() 10 blocks upward from 1 block above ritual stone$(br)$(bold)Altar Range:$() Searches 11x21x11 for a Blood Altar$(br2)Each kill provides 200 LP (configurable) to the altar. Works on all non-boss entities.

pages.title: Boss Killing
pages.text: $(bold)Boss Entities:$()$(br)Can kill boss entities with sufficient $(will)Destructive Will$()!$(br2)$(li)Requires 99+ Destructive Will$(li)Extra LP cost (configurable)$(li)Makes bosses vulnerable$(br2)$(bold)Protection:$() Entities tagged $(#)animus:disallow_culling$() cannot be killed.

pages.title: Will & TNT
pages.text: $(bold)Demon Will:$() Generates $(will)Destructive Will$() from kills (3% chance per cycle, max 100 will).$(br2)$(bold)TNT Destruction:$() If configured, this ritual can also destroy Primed TNT entities, making it useful for defense.$(br2)$(italic)With great power comes great responsibility.$()
